page.title: 07Population
page.content: Our street is full of people who are kind and helpful. A lot of pensioners live in our street,the oldest is 87.He fought in the 1914-18 and the 1939-1945 wars and has got a lot of medals. I have made lots of new friends because many of the old people are dying and new families are moving in. On hot days people just sit on their doorstep,reading and sunbathing.The kids are always playing football or riding their BMX bikes.At night our street is very noisy due to the cars going into the local garage. We made a bar chart of the "size of families" in the two top-classes in our school.The survey involved 45 children and revealed that the average size-of-family was 5 people.The largest family had 11 members and the smallest family had only 2 members.
